name: Road Rage Royale Demo
description:
This is the 2 player demo for Road Rage Royale.

Road Rage Royale is a cyberpunk post-apocalyptic "demolition derby". It is both a fighting and a racing game. You play a cyborg at the wheel of an indestructible vehicle fueled by his own rage.

Road Rage Royale is a PC local multiplayer game for 2 - 4 players.

Your car is your only weapon, your piloting, positioning and tactical skills will make you survive or knock you out.
